There is no balanced approach to the solution of the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict, it is impossible to put the occupier and the country under occupation on a scale
If there were no strong supporters behind Armenia today, the Nagorno-Karabakh problem would have been resolved long ago.
The Armenian lobby affects the governments of the respective countries. This factor is a major obstacle to the settlement of the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
Azerbaijan is making its valuable contribution to energy security not only in the region, but also on the European continent.
The policy pursued by Azerbaijan is based on the interests of # Azerbaijani citizens and the state. These interests are more than anything else.
# Azerbaijan is one of the rare countries that have recently voiced its voice over the crisis of migrants. It is impossible to endure this injustice.
# Azerbaijan expresses the will of its people, does not interfere in the work of anybody, but it does not allow anyone to interfere with its work and cause damage.
